title: Dark logos :o)
content:
Hello,

these 2 identities are for sale, so I would experience what you would see drawn in such identities and what you miss actually. What are dreamforms most people like them? If someone found favours on logos: please mail me! Of course I would change and finish to customer wish and optimize for purpose.

[wadim@kahlkopf.com](mailto:wadim@kahlkopf.com)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [diabolo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020073149/http:/typophile.com/files/diabolo.gif) | 64.51 KB |
| [batjeans.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020073149/http:/typophile.com/files/batjeans.gif) | 27.63 KB |
author: Wadim Kahlkopf

comments.content: The first one looks like a logo for a heavy medal band. The second one would be a stretch for a jeans company. Maybe a secondary brand. Both Mens and Womans Jeans need to be pushed a squoosh to the right to balance the weight with the line above them. I would also ask you to develope them as black and white solutions. The jeans line especially being they have either printing or embrodery restrictions. Good work keep going

So Dan, here a new dark concept in your favorite picture colour. :o)  
It stay the same: it`s for sell if anybody like it.

[http://www.kahlkopf.com/files/nibelungen.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020073149/http:/www.kahlkopf.com/files/nibelungen.gif "http://www.kahlkopf.com/files/nibelungen.gif")
